title: What is a super cool country most people don’t even know exists? - Quora

response.answer_text: Czech Republic/Czechia  People know our wonderful capital Prague  But the rest of the country Is very unknown… From hundreds of historical municipalities  Many natural park and reserves with tens thousands kilometres of marked touristic tracks  Tens of chateaux and castles opened to public  Many cafes, restaurants, pubs, clubs…  Top-notch museums and galleries  Well, there is practically everything you can imagine…  Moreover without primitive nationalism or blind optimism… there are not many better places where you could live…. Vojta Rod's answer to What is it like to live in Czechia?
